title: PCFM Week: Do Spats Damage Our Kids?
description:
The Proper Care and Feeding of Marriage Week: In this classic couples counseling episode, Pete and Shelby fear their petty squabbles are hurting the children, and Dr. Laura shares the story, “The Gift of the Magi,” to help them see what's really important. - Dr. Laura: "Live your life to make each other happy, and give your love as a gift."

What are you squabling with your spouse about? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura's book: “The Proper Care & Feeding of Marriage”

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-the-proper-care-and-feeding-of-marriage

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura
